title: PIZZA-SPAGHETTI CASSEROLE
directions: 1. Boil water & salt for Spaghetti noodles, once it starts boiling, add noodles.
2. Brown meat in a separate frying pan.
3. Once noodles are cooked, drain and put in a casserole dish.
4. In a separate bowl, combine milk & egg & whisk.
5. Pour over pasta & add jar of sauce, can of tomatoes, garlic powder, & oregano.
7. On top of pasta mixture, layer the ground meat, then add a layer of pepperoni's.
10. Bake in the oven at 350 for 30 minutes
ingredients: 1 16 oz. can diced Italian style tomatoes
1 (8 ounce) package shredded Italian cheese blend (low fat)
Any other pizza toppings, you can add like Black olives, sausage, onions, green peppers, etc..
